TextView.android:text: With rapid increase in the usage of social networks sites across the world, there is also a steady increase in blood donation requests as being noticed in the number of posts on these sites such as Facebook and twitter seeking blood donors. Finding blood donor is a challenging issue in almost every country.\n\nSeveral software technologies including languages and framework are used to develop our blood-donor web application known as BLOOd BANK application.These technologies comprise of Java Language along with material design library and FireBase as Database.
